DOC.brief_summary: Study hypothesis : Music pace improves quality exercise test child . Children tend cycle non-constant pace exercise testing , might make test less reliable . 20 boy perform two exercise test cycle ergometer . One test do constant tempoed music , without . Different parameter check include pedal cadence , aerobic fitness , level work load obtain .
